name: Humankind
content: 我听到这首最奇怪的歌
A DJ a star away is
Playing it to turn us on
播放这首歌 让我们兴奋不已
I feel it inside it's flowing
我感觉内心深处热血沸腾
I say I know I know I know
I know I know I know
I know I know I know
他们仍然称呼我们为人类
今天我体会到最奇怪的感觉
I feel it inside now I'm flying
我在内心深处感受到 我展翅高飞
I know I know I know
I know I know I know
I know I know I know
他们仍然称呼我们为人类
I feel it inside now I'm flying
我在内心深处感受到 我展翅高飞
I know I know I know
I know I know I know
I know I know I know
所以他们称呼我们为人类
